original_text: Those teachers call themselves very special apostles. But I think that I am as special as they are!
korean_text: 나는 지극히 크다는 사도들보다 부족한 것이 조금도 없는 줄로 생각하노라

sentences.original_text: Those teachers call themselves very special apostles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 교사들은 자신들을 매우 특별한 사도라고 부릅니다.

sentences.original_text: that I am as special as they are!
